Title: Authorizes any registered voter to vote by absentee ballot
Summary: Authorizes any registered voter to vote by absentee ballot; establishes a voter's right to cast a final vote on election day to nullify an earlier or absentee vote.
LawCode: Amd ยง8-400, add Art 8 Title 6 ยง8-600, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to authorizing any registered voter to vote by absentee ballot and in relation to establishing a right to a final vote
